Articles.Content:
Hello to all my fellow kerbalnauts! Been playing the game since I found it on Steam at .18 and lurking on the forums for craft ideas and how-to's. Thought I'd finally drop a line to introduce myself.

I've been able to successfully rendezvous and dock (after several launches and lost kerbals) and finally have my orbiting core for my station. Currently prototyping a lander design for future missions to the Mun which Jeb is happily volunteering for.
